description: This course is the very first step to building a website. Basic knowledge of using the computer and searching on the web. Will give a very brief knowledge how the internet started. I will take it really slow and hand pick material you would need to know. I plan to keep each section three to five minutes long. Some may be longer than others. Easy to follow course. If you have been interested in website building, or how content is put on a website. What goes on behind the scenes of a website, and how to manipulate content to capture your audiences attention. Then, this course is what you have been looking for.Â
title: HTML5 Basic Course using Notepad++
